attributes.action: ban all religious teachings that assert that any deity or prophet is more valid than those of any other religion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As history has shown, any religion that is founded on the principle of its deity, deities or prophet's teachings being superior to those of any other religion is guaranteed to cause division, intolerance, prejudice and often violent (and sometimes murderous) behaviour in society.

Therefore we respectfully request the formation of laws that make the practice and promotion of such religions illegal unless those religions also officially recognise the validity and equal status of deities and prophets from all opposing religions, and in the interest of equality also officially recognise and state due respect and full validity towards the views of atheists.
